title: Step 1: Create Instance entry point + UI-only placeholder in Whisper shell

requirements.summary: Add a visible “Create Instance” entry point in the primary WhisperDavenport-IA UI (header actions and/or prominent main section) with no backend calls.
acceptanceCriteria: A button or link labeled exactly “Create Instance” is visible on the main app shell without requiring navigation or authentication.
Clicking “Create Instance” does not call the backend and does not require any canister changes.
The entry point is styled consistently with the existing theme (Tailwind + shadcn components already used in App.tsx).

file_operations.description: Add a new header action Button labeled exactly “Create Instance” near the existing “Connect” button, wired to UI-only state (no actor usage, no network calls). Use the shadcn-ui Button component already used in this file for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a prominent “Create Instance” call-to-action in the main content area (e.g., near the hero section) that triggers the same UI-only open state as the header button, ensuring discoverability without navigation or authentication. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: On click of “Create Instance”, show a dismissible lightweight UI-only placeholder explaining instance creation is coming next step and defining an “instance” as a city/county/state Whisper site.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “Create Instance” opens a placeholder UI (modal/dialog/sheet/inline card) without navigating away or breaking the page layout.
The placeholder contains English user-facing text that mentions city/county/state as possible instance levels.
The placeholder UI can be dismissed/closed and returns the user to the main shell state.
No form fields, duplicate checks, registry calls, or admin screens are implemented in this step.

file_operations.description: Create a lightweight, dismissible placeholder UI component rendered as an inline panel/card (no routing) that contains English text describing that instance creation will be implemented in the next step and defines an “instance” as a city/county/state Whisper site. Use shadcn-ui Card and Button components for consistent styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the CreateInstancePlaceholderCard into the existing shell using local React state (open/closed). Clicking either “Create Instance” entry point opens it; a Close/Dismiss action hides it and restores the main shell state. Keep behavior UI-only: do not import/use backend actor hooks or queries. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
